system.description:
The past has much to teach, and your studies have granted you truly vital insights that you share with all those around you.  You gain the following benefits:

  • Any time a scholar ability requires you to spend inspiration, you may expend a use of bardic inspiration instead.
  • You gain additional uses of bardic inspiration equal to your intelligence modifier.
  • Half your scholar levels stack with bard levels for the purposes of the varied expertise ability.
